00011 #include "STC.h"

00017 
00024 void STC::Hassibi_block_code(void)
00025 /* this function implements the A and B matrices needed for Space-Time block codes generation following the Hassibi's approach:
00026  * S = sum_{q=1}^symb_block (A_q alpha_q + jB_q beta_q),
00027  * where s_q = alpha_q+jbeta_q is the symbol after modulation
00028  * each A_q and B_q matrix has dimension TxM
00029  * different A_q and B_q matrices are stacked one below the other, e.g. [A_1;A_2;...;A_Q]
00030 
00031  * input: code_name - code name whose generator matrices are to be generated
00032  *        const_size - constellation size (used in Damen code)
00033  * ouputs: symb_block - number of symbols per block
00034  *         A, B - generator matrices
00035  * inputs/ouputs: for some codes these are inputs for others they are
00036  * predefined, so they are outputs only
00037  *               em_antennas - number of emission antenna
00038  *               channel_uses - channel uses
00039 
00040 
00041  * author: Bogdan Cristea
00042  * revision date 19/02/07: Golden code was changed to have TxM generator matrices
00043  * revision date 18/01/08: translation to C++
00044  */
00045 { 
00046     if (code_name=="V-BLAST_MxN")//classical V-BLAST
00047     {
00048         symb_block = channel_uses*em_antennas;//number of symbols/block
00049         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameter is predefined:" << std::endl;
00050         std::cout << "symb_block = channel_uses*em_antennas = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00051         A.set_size(symb_block*channel_uses, em_antennas);
00052         A.zeros();
00053         itpp::mat temp(channel_uses, em_antennas);
00054         temp.zeros();
00055         register int tau,m;
00056         for(tau=0;tau<channel_uses;tau++)
00057         {
00058             for(m=0;m<em_antennas;m++)
00059             {
00060                 temp(tau,m) = 1;
00061                 A.set_submatrix((em_antennas*(tau-1)+m-1), 0, to_cmat(temp));
00062                 temp(tau,m) = 0;
00063             }
00064         }
00065         B = A;
00066     } 
00067     else if (code_name=="imp_V-BLAST_MxN")//improved V-BLAST (code (31) in Hassibi's paper)
00068     {
00069         if (channel_uses!=em_antennas)
00070         {
00071             std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " channel_uses and em_antennas must be equal. Choosing channel_uses=em_antennas" << std::endl;
00072             channel_uses = em_antennas;
00073         }
00074         symb_block = channel_uses*em_antennas;//number of symbols/block
00075         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameter is predefined:" << std::endl;
00076         std::cout << "symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00077         std::complex<double> j(0,1);
00078         itpp::cmat D = itpp::diag(exp(j*(2*itpp::pi/em_antennas)*itpp::linspace(0, em_antennas-1, em_antennas)));
00079         itpp::mat P = itpp::diag(itpp::ones(em_antennas-1), -1);
00080         P(0,em_antennas-1) = 1;
00081         A.set_size(symb_block*channel_uses, em_antennas);
00082         A.zeros();
00083         register int k,l;
00084         for (k=0;k<channel_uses;k++)        
00085             for (l=0;l<em_antennas;l++)         
00086                 A.set_submatrix((em_antennas*k+l)*channel_uses, 0, diag_pow(D, k)*itpp::to_cmat(mat_pow(P, l))/sqrt(em_antennas));                                  
00087         B = A;
00088     }
00089     else if (code_name=="Alamouti_2xN")//Alamouti's orthogonal code
00090     {    
00091         em_antennas = 2;//emission antenna
00092         channel_uses = 2;//channel uses
00093         symb_block = 2;//number of symbols/block
00094         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameters are predefined:" << std::endl;
00095         std::cout << "em_antennas = " << em_antennas << ", channel_uses = " << channel_uses << ", symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00096         A = "1  0;\
00097              0  1;\
00098              0  1;\
00099             -1  0";//A_1; A_2
00100         B = "1  0;\
00101              0 -1;\
00102              0  1;\
00103              1  0";//B_1; B_2
00104     }
00105     else if (code_name=="Switched_Alamouti_4xN")
00106     {
00107         em_antennas = 4;//emission antenna
00108         channel_uses = 4;//channel uses
00109         symb_block = 4;//number of symbols/block
00110         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameters are predefined:" << std::endl;
00111         std::cout << "em_antennas = " << em_antennas << ", channel_uses = " << channel_uses << ", symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00112         A = "1  0  0  0;\
00113              0  1  0  0;\
00114              0  0  0  0;\
00115              0  0  0  0;\
00116              0  1  0  0;\
00117              -1 0  0  0;\
00118              0  0  0  0;\
00119              0  0  0  0;\
00120              0  0  0  0;\
00121              0  0  0  0;\
00122              0  0  1  0;\
00123              0  0  0  1;\
00124              0  0  0  0;\
00125              0  0  0  0;\
00126              0  0  0  1;\
00127              0  0  -1 0";//A_1; A_2; A_3; A_4
00128         A *= sqrt(2);//normalization
00129         B = "1  0  0  0;\
00130              0  -1 0  0;\
00131              0  0  0  0;\
00132              0  0  0  0;\
00133              0  1  0  0;\
00134              1  0  0  0;\
00135              0  0  0  0;\
00136              0  0  0  0;\
00137              0  0  0  0;\
00138              0  0  0  0;\
00139              0  0  1  0;\
00140              0  0  0  -1;\
00141              0  0  0  0;\
00142              0  0  0  0;\
00143              0  0  0  1;\
00144              0  0  1  0";//B_1; B_2; B_3; B_4
00145          B *= sqrt(2);         
00146     }
00147     else if (code_name=="Double_Alamouti_4xN")
00148     {
00149         em_antennas = 4;//emission antenna
00150         channel_uses = 2;//channel uses
00151         symb_block = 4;//number of symbols/block
00152         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameters are predefined:" << std::endl;
00153         std::cout << "em_antennas = " << em_antennas << ", channel_uses = " << channel_uses << ", symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00154         A = "1  0  0  0;\
00155              0  1  0  0;\
00156              0  0  1  0;\
00157              0  0  0  1;\
00158              0  1  0  0;\
00159              -1 0  0  0;\
00160              0  0  0  1;\
00161              0  0  -1 0";//A_1; A_2; A_3; A_4
00162         B = "1  0  0  0;\
00163              0  -1 0  0;\
00164              0  0  1  0;\
00165              0  0  0 -1;\
00166              0  1  0  0;\
00167              1  0  0  0;\
00168              0  0  0  1;\
00169              0  0  1  0";//B_1; B_2; B_3; B_4
00170     }
00171     else if (code_name=="Jafarkhani_4xN")//Jafarkhani's quasi-orthogonal code
00172     {
00173         em_antennas = 4;//emission antenna
00174         channel_uses = 4;//channel uses
00175         symb_block = 4;//number of symbols/block
00176         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameters are predefined:" << std::endl;
00177         std::cout << "em_antennas = " << em_antennas << ", channel_uses = " << channel_uses << ", symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00178         A = "1  0  0  0;\
00179              0  1  0  0;\
00180              0  0  1  0;\
00181              0  0  0  1;\
00182              0  1  0  0;\
00183              -1 0  0  0;\
00184              0  0  0  1;\
00185              0  0  -1 0;\
00186              0  0  1  0;\
00187              0  0  0  1;\
00188              -1 0  0  0;\
00189              0  -1 0  0;\
00190              0  0  0  1;\
00191              0  0  -1 0;\
00192              0  -1 0  0;\
00193              1  0  0  0";//A_1; A_2; A_3; A_4
00194         B = "1  0  0  0;\
00195              0  -1  0  0;\
00196              0  0  -1  0;\
00197              0  0  0  1;\
00198              0  1  0  0;\
00199              1  0  0  0;\
00200              0  0  0  -1;\
00201              0  0  -1 0;\
00202              0  0  1  0;\
00203              0  0  0  -1;\
00204              1  0  0  0;\
00205              0  -1 0  0;\
00206              0  0  0  1;\
00207              0  0  1  0;\
00208              0  1  0  0;\
00209              1  0  0  0";//B_1; B_2; B_3; B_4
00210     }
00211     else if (code_name=="Golden_2x2")//Golden code as proposed by Belfiore
00212     {
00213         em_antennas = 2;//emission antenna
00214         channel_uses = 2;//channel uses
00215         symb_block = 4;//number of symbols/block
00216         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameters are predefined:" << std::endl;
00217         std::cout << "em_antennas = " << em_antennas << ", channel_uses = " << channel_uses << ", symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00218         std::complex<double> theta((1+sqrt(5))/2,0);
00219         std::complex<double> theta_b((1-sqrt(5))/2,0);
00220         std::complex<double> j(0,1);
00221         std::complex<double> one(1,0);
00222         std::complex<double> alpha = one+j*(one-theta);
00223         std::complex<double> alpha_b = one+j*(one-theta_b);
00224         std::complex<double> gamma = j;
00225         A.set_size(8,2);
00226         A(0,0) = alpha/sqrt(5);       A(0,1) = 0;
00227         A(1,0) = 0;                   A(1,1) =  alpha_b/sqrt(5);//A_1
00228         A(2,0) = alpha*theta/sqrt(5); A(2,1) = 0;
00229         A(3,0) = 0;                   A(3,1) = alpha_b*theta_b/sqrt(5);//A_2
00230         A(4,0) = 0;                   A(4,1) = gamma*alpha_b/sqrt(5);
00231         A(5,0) = alpha/sqrt(5);       A(5,1) = 0;//A_3
00232         A(6,0) = 0;                   A(6,1) = gamma*alpha_b*theta_b/sqrt(5);
00233         A(7,0) = alpha*theta/sqrt(5); A(7,1) = 0;//A_4
00234         B = A;
00235     }
00236     else if (code_name=="Damen_2x2")//ST code based on number theory as proposed by Damen
00237     {
00238         em_antennas = 2;//emission antenna
00239         channel_uses = 2;//channel uses
00240         symb_block = 4;//number of symbols/block
00241         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameters are predefined:" << std::endl;
00242         std::cout << "em_antennas = " << em_antennas << ", channel_uses = " << channel_uses << ", symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00243         double lambda;
00244         if (const_size==4)
00245             lambda = 0.5;
00246         else if (const_size==16)
00247             lambda = 0.521;
00248         else if (const_size>=256)
00249             lambda = itpp::pi/4;
00250         else
00251         {
00252             lambda = itpp::pi/4;
00253             std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " and const. size " << const_size << ", lambda has the value " << lambda << std::endl;
00254         }
00255         std::complex<double> j(0,1);
00256         std::complex<double> phi = exp(j*lambda);
00257         std::complex<double> theta = exp(j*(lambda/2));
00258         A.set_size(8, 2);
00259         A(0,0) = 1/sqrt(2);         A(0,1) = 0;
00260         A(1,0) = 0;                 A(1,1) = 1/sqrt(2);//A_1
00261         A(2,0) = phi/sqrt(2);       A(2,1) = 0;
00262         A(3,0) = 0;                 A(3,1) = -phi/sqrt(2);//A_2
00263         A(4,0) = 0;                 A(4,1) = theta/sqrt(2);
00264         A(5,0) = theta/sqrt(2);     A(5,1) = 0;//A_3
00265         A(6,0) = 0;                 A(6,1) = -theta*phi/sqrt(2);
00266         A(7,0) = theta*phi/sqrt(2); A(7,1) = 0;//A_4
00267         B = A;
00268     }
00269     else if (code_name=="34ortho_3xN")//rate 3/4 orthogonal code (mutual information 5.13 bits/channel use at rho=20 dB)
00270     {
00271         em_antennas = 3;//emission antenna
00272         channel_uses = 4;//channel uses
00273         symb_block = 3;//number of symbols/block
00274         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameters are predefined:" << std::endl;
00275         std::cout << "em_antennas = " << em_antennas << ", channel_uses = " << channel_uses << ", symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00276         A = "1 0 0;\
00277              0 1 0;\
00278              0 0 1;\
00279              0 0 0;\
00280              0 1 0;\
00281              -1 0 0;\
00282              0 0 0;\
00283              0 0 1;\
00284              0 0 1;\
00285              0 0 0;\
00286              -1 0 0;\
00287              0 -1 0";//A_1; A_2; A_3
00288         A /= sqrt(double(4)/double(3));
00289         B = "1 0 0;\
00290              0 -1 0;\
00291              0 0 -1;\
00292              0 0 0;\
00293              0 1 0;\
00294              1 0 0;\
00295              0 0 0;\
00296              0 0 -1;\
00297              0 0 1;\
00298              0 0 0;\
00299              1 0 0;\
00300              0 1 0";//B_1; B_2; B_3
00301          B /= sqrt(double(4)/double(3));
00302     }
00303     else if (code_name=="36LD_3xN")//(36) LD code with mutual info. 6.25bits/channel use at rho=20dB
00304     {
00305         em_antennas = 3;//emission antenna
00306         channel_uses = 4;//channel uses
00307         symb_block = 4;//number of symbols/block
00308         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameters are predefined:" << std::endl;
00309         std::cout << "em_antennas = " << em_antennas << ", channel_uses = " << channel_uses << ", symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00310         A.set_size(16, 3);
00311         A(0,0) = 1;           A(0,1) = 0;           A(0,2) = 0;
00312         A(1,0) = 1;           A(1,1) = 1;           A(1,2) = 0;
00313         A(2,0) = 0;           A(2,1) = 0;           A(2,2) = 1;
00314         A(3,0) = 0;           A(3,1) = 0;           A(3,2) = 0;//A_1
00315         A(4,0) = 0;           A(4,1) = 1/sqrt(2);   A(4,2) = 0;
00316         A(5,0) = -1/sqrt(2);  A(5,1) = 0;           A(5,2) = -1/sqrt(2);
00317         A(6,0) = 0;           A(6,1) = 1/sqrt(2);   A(6,2) = 0;
00318         A(7,0) = 1/sqrt(2);   A(7,1) = 0;           A(7,2) = -1/sqrt(2);//A_2
00319         A(8,0) = 1;           A(8,1) = 0;           A(8,2) = 0;
00320         A(9,0) = 0;           A(9,1) = 0;           A(9,2) = 0;
00321         A(10,0) = 0;          A(10,1) = 0;          A(10,2) = -1;
00322         A(11,0) = 0;          A(11,1) = -1;         A(11,2) = 0;//A_3
00323         A(12,0) = 0;          A(12,1) = -1/sqrt(2); A(12,2) = 0;
00324         A(13,0) = 1/sqrt(2);  A(13,1) = 0;          A(13,2) = -1/sqrt(2);
00325         A(14,0) = 0;          A(14,1) = 1/sqrt(2);  A(14,2) = 0;
00326         A(15,0) = -1/sqrt(2); A(15,1) = 0;          A(15,2) = -1/sqrt(2);//A_4
00327         B.set_size(16, 3);
00328         B(0,0) = 0;                     B(0,1) = -1/sqrt(2);           B(0,2) = 0;
00329         B(1,0) = -1/sqrt(2);            B(1,1) = 0;                    B(1,2) = 1/sqrt(2);
00330         B(2,0) = 0;                     B(2,1) = 1/sqrt(2);            B(2,2) = 0;
00331         B(3,0) = 1/sqrt(2);             B(3,1) = 0;                    B(3,2) = 1/sqrt(2);//B_1
00332         B(4,0) = 1/sqrt(2);             B(4,1) = double(-1)/double(2); B(4,2) = 0;
00333         B(5,0) = double(-1)/double(2);  B(5,1) = -1/sqrt(2);           B(5,2) = double(-1)/double(2);
00334         B(6,0) = 0;                     B(6,1) = double(-1)/double(2); B(6,2) = 1/sqrt(2);
00335         B(7,0) = double(1)/double(2);   B(7,1) = 0;                    B(7,2) = double(-1)/double(2);//B_2
00336         B(8,0) = 1/sqrt(2);             B(8,1) = double(1)/double(2);  B(8,2) = 0;
00337         B(9,0) = double(1)/double(2);   B(9,1) = -1/sqrt(2);           B(9,2) = double(1)/double(2);
00338         B(10,0) = 0;                    B(10,1) = double(1)/double(2); B(10,2) = 1/sqrt(2);
00339         B(11,0) = double(-1)/double(2); B(11,1) = 0;                   B(11,2) = double(1)/double(2);//B_3
00340         B(12,0) = 1;                    B(12,1) = 0;                   B(12,2) = 0;
00341         B(13,0) = 0;                    B(13,1) = 0;                   B(13,2) = 0;
00342         B(14,0) = 0;                    B(14,1) = 0;                   B(14,2) = -1;
00343         B(15,0) = 0;                    B(15,1) = 1;                   B(15,2) = 0;//B_4
00344     }
00345     else if (code_name=="37LD_3xN")//(37) LD code 3-antenna LD code obtained from the symetrical concatenation of 3 2-antenna orthogonal design
00346     {
00347         em_antennas = 3;//emission antenna
00348         channel_uses = 6;//channel uses

00352         A = "1  0  0;\
00353              0  1  0;\
00354              0  0  0;\
00355              0  0  0;\
00356              0  0  0;\
00357              0  0  0;\
00358              0  1  0;\

00373              0 -1  0;\
00374              0  0  0;\
00375              0  0  0;\

00377              0  0  0;\
00378              0  0  0;\
00379              0  0  0;\
00380              1  0  0;\

00385              0  0  0;\

00387              -1 0  0";//A_1; A_2; A_3; A_4; A_5; A_6
00388         A *= sqrt(double(3)/double(2));
00389         B = "1  0  0;\
00390              0  -1  0;\
00391              0  0  0;\
00392              0  0  0;\
00393              0  0  0;\
00394              0  0  0;\
00395              0  1  0;\
00396              1 0  0;\
00397              0  0  0;\
00398              0  0  0;\
00399              0  0  0;\
00400              0  0  0;\
00401              0  0  0;\
00402              0  0  0;\
00403              0  1  0;\
00404              0  0  -1;\
00405              0  0  0;\
00406              0  0  0;\
00407              0  0  0;\
00408              0  0  0;\
00409              0  0  1;\
00410              0  1  0;\
00411              0  0  0;\
00412              0  0  0;\
00413              0  0  0;\
00414              0  0  0;\
00415              0  0  0;\
00416              0  0  0;\
00417              1  0  0;\
00418              0  0  -1;\
00419              0  0  0;\
00420              0  0  0;\
00421              0  0  0;\
00422              0  0  0;\
00423              0  0  1;\
00424              1  0  0";//B_1; B_2; B_3; B_4; B_5; B_6
00425         B *= sqrt(double(3)/double(2));
00426     }
00427     else if (code_name=="39LD_3xN")
00428     {
00429         em_antennas = 3;//emission antenna
00430         channel_uses = 6;//channel uses
00431         symb_block = 6;//number of symbols/block
00432         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: Warning! For " << code_name << " the following parameters are predefined:" << std::endl;
00433         std::cout << "em_antennas = " << em_antennas << ", channel_uses = " << channel_uses << ", symb_block = " << symb_block << std::endl;
00434         A.set_size(36, 3);
00435         A(0,0) = 1/sqrt(2);             A(0,1) = 0;                     A(0,2) = 0;
00436         A(1,0) = 0;                     A(1,1) = 1/sqrt(2);             A(1,2) = 0;
00437         A(2,0) = 0;                     A(2,1) = 1/sqrt(2);             A(2,2) = 0;
00438         A(3,0) = 0;                     A(3,1) = 0;                     A(3,2) = 1/sqrt(2);
00439         A(4,0) = 1/sqrt(2);             A(4,1) = 0;                     A(4,2) = 0;
00440         A(5,0) = 0;                     A(5,1) = 0;                     A(5,2) = 1/sqrt(2);//A_1
00441         A(6,0) = 0;                     A(6,1) = 1/sqrt(2);             A(6,2) = 0;
00442         A(7,0) = -1/sqrt(2);            A(7,1) = 0;                     A(7,2) = 0;
00443         A(8,0) = 0;                     A(8,1) = 0;                     A(8,2) = 1/sqrt(2);
00444         A(9,0) = 0;                     A(9,1) = -1/sqrt(2);            A(9,2) = 0;
00445         A(10,0) = 0;                    A(10,1) = 0;                    A(10,2) = 1/sqrt(2);
00446         A(11,0) = -1/sqrt(2);           A(11,1) = 0;                    A(11,2) = 0;//A_2
00447         A(12,0) = 1/sqrt(2);            A(12,1) = 0;                    A(12,2) = 0;
00448         A(13,0) = 0;                    A(13,1) = 1/sqrt(2);            A(13,2) = 0;
00449         A(14,0) = 0;                    A(14,1) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       A(14,2) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00450         A(15,0) = 0;                    A(15,1) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));  A(15,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00451         A(16,0) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       A(16,1) = 0;                    A(16,2) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00452         A(17,0) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2)); A(17,1) = 0;                    A(17,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));//A_3
00453         A(18,0) = 0;                    A(18,1) = 1/sqrt(2);            A(18,2) = 0;
00454         A(19,0) = -1/sqrt(2);           A(19,1) = 0;                    A(19,2) = 0;
00455         A(20,0) = 0;                    A(20,1) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));  A(20,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00456         A(21,0) = 0;                    A(21,1) = 1/(2*sqrt(2));        A(21,2) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00457         A(22,0) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2)); A(22,1) = 0;                    A(22,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00458         A(23,0) = 1/(2*sqrt(2));        A(23,1) = 0;                    A(23,2) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));//A_4
00459         A(24,0) = 1/sqrt(2);            A(24,1) = 0;                    A(24,2) = 0;
00460         A(25,0) = 0;                    A(25,1) = 1/sqrt(2);            A(25,2) = 0;
00461         A(26,0) = 0;                    A(26,1) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       A(26,2) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00462         A(27,0) = 0;                    A(27,1) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2)); A(27,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00463         A(28,0) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       A(28,1) = 0;                    A(28,2) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00464         A(29,0) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));  A(29,1) = 0;                    A(29,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));//A_5
00465         A(30,0) = 0;                    A(30,1) = 1/sqrt(2);            A(30,2) = 0;
00466         A(31,0) = -1/sqrt(2);           A(31,1) = 0;                    A(31,2) = 0;
00467         A(32,0) = 0;                    A(32,1) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2)); A(32,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00468         A(33,0) = 0;                    A(33,1) = 1/(2*sqrt(2));        A(33,2) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00469         A(34,0) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));  A(34,1) = 0;                    A(34,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00470         A(35,0) = 1/(2*sqrt(2));        A(35,1) = 0;                    A(35,2) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));//A_6
00471         B.set_size(36, 3);
00472         B(0,0) = 1/sqrt(2);             B(0,1) = 0;                     B(0,2) = 0;
00473         B(1,0) = 0;                     B(1,1) = -1/sqrt(2);            B(1,2) = 0;
00474         B(2,0) = 0;                     B(2,1) = 1/sqrt(2);             B(2,2) = 0;
00475         B(3,0) = 0;                     B(3,1) = 0;                     B(3,2) = -1/sqrt(2);
00476         B(4,0) = 1/sqrt(2);             B(4,1) = 0;                     B(4,2) = 0;
00477         B(5,0) = 0;                     B(5,1) = 0;                     B(5,2) = -1/sqrt(2);//B_1
00478         B(6,0) = 0;                     B(6,1) = 1/sqrt(2);             B(6,2) = 0;
00479         B(7,0) = 1/sqrt(2);             B(7,1) = 0;                     B(7,2) = 0;
00480         B(8,0) = 0;                     B(8,1) = 0;                     B(8,2) = 1/sqrt(2);
00481         B(9,0) = 0;                     B(9,1) = 1/sqrt(2);             B(9,2) = 0;
00482         B(10,0) = 0;                    B(10,1) = 0;                    B(10,2) = 1/sqrt(2);
00483         B(11,0) = 1/sqrt(2);            B(11,1) = 0;                    B(11,2) = 0;//B_2
00484         B(12,0) = 1/sqrt(2);            B(12,1) = 0;                    B(12,2) = 0;
00485         B(13,0) = 0;                    B(13,1) = -1/sqrt(2);           B(13,2) = 0;
00486         B(14,0) = 0;                    B(14,1) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       B(14,2) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00487         B(15,0) = 0;                    B(15,1) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2)); B(15,2) = 1/(2*sqrt(2));
00488         B(16,0) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       B(16,1) = 0;                    B(16,2) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00489         B(17,0) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));  B(17,1) = 0;                    B(17,2) = 1/(2*sqrt(2));//B_3
00490         B(18,0) = 0;                    B(18,1) = 1/sqrt(2);            B(18,2) = 0;
00491         B(19,0) = 1/sqrt(2);            B(19,1) = 0;                    B(19,2) = 0;
00492         B(20,0) = 0;                    B(20,1) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));  B(20,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00493         B(21,0) = 0;                    B(21,1) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       B(21,2) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00494         B(22,0) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2)); B(22,1) = 0;                    B(22,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00495         B(23,0) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       B(23,1) = 0;                    B(23,2) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));//B_4
00496         B(24,0) = 1/sqrt(2);            B(24,1) = 0;                    B(24,2) = 0;
00497         B(25,0) = 0;                    B(25,1) = -1/sqrt(2);           B(25,2) = 0;
00498         B(26,0) = 0;                    B(26,1) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       B(26,2) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00499         B(27,0) = 0;                    B(27,1) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));  B(27,2) = 1/(2*sqrt(2));
00500         B(28,0) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       B(28,1) = 0;                    B(28,2) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00501         B(29,0) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2)); B(29,1) = 0;                    B(29,2) = 1/(2*sqrt(2));//B_5
00502         B(30,0) = 0;                    B(30,1) = 1/sqrt(2);            B(30,2) = 0;
00503         B(31,0) = 1/sqrt(2);            B(31,1) = 0;                    B(31,2) = 0;
00504         B(32,0) = 0;                    B(32,1) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2)); B(32,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00505         B(33,0) = 0;                    B(33,1) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       B(33,2) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));
00506         B(34,0) = sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));  B(34,1) = 0;                    B(34,2) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));
00507         B(35,0) = -1/(2*sqrt(2));       B(35,1) = 0;                    B(35,2) = -sqrt(3)/(2*sqrt(2));//B_6
00508     }
00509     else
00510         std::cout << "STC::LDcode: unknown code name. Available codes are: V-BLAST_MxN, imp_V-BLAST_MxN, Alamouti_2xN, \
00511         Switched_Alamouti_4xN, Double_Alamouti_4xN, Jafarkhani_4xN, Golden_2x2, Damen_2x2, 34ortho_3xN, 36LD_3xN, 37LD_3xN, 39LD_3xN" << std::endl;
00512 }
00513 
00514 itpp::cmat STC::Hassibi_encode(const itpp::cvec &symb)
00515 //LD code generation (symb_block symbols go to an channel_uses x em_antennas matrix) following Hassibi's approach
00516 {   
00517     int nb_subblocks = symb.length()/symb_block;
00518     int tx_duration = channel_uses*nb_subblocks;
00519     itpp::cmat S(tx_duration,em_antennas);
00520     itpp::cmat temp(channel_uses,em_antennas);
00521     std::complex<double> j(0,1);
00522     register int ns,k;    
00523     for (ns=0;ns<nb_subblocks;ns++)//encode block by block (symb_block symbols)
00524     {
00525         temp.zeros();
00526         for (k=0;k<symb_block;k++)//sum over all symb_block matrices
00527             temp += (A(k*channel_uses,(k+1)*channel_uses-1,0,em_antennas-1)*static_cast< std::complex<double> >(symb(k+ns*symb_block).real())\
00528                     +j*B(k*channel_uses,(k+1)*channel_uses-1,0,em_antennas-1)*static_cast< std::complex<double> >(symb(k+ns*symb_block).imag()));
00529         S.set_submatrix(ns*channel_uses, 0, temp);
00530     }
00531     return S;
00532 }
00533 
00534 inline itpp::cmat STC::diag_pow(const itpp::cmat &in_mat, const double &in_exp)
00535 //first input should be a diagonal square matrix with complex elements
00536 {
00537     register int n;
00538     int dim = in_mat.rows();
00539     itpp::cmat out_mat(dim,dim);
00540     for (n=0;n<dim;n++)
00541         out_mat(n,n) = std::pow(in_mat(n,n), in_exp);
00542     return out_mat;
00543 }
00544 
00545 inline itpp::mat STC::mat_pow(const itpp::mat &in_mat, const int &in_exp)
00546 //square matrix power of integer exponent
00547 {
00548     if (in_exp==0)
00549         return itpp::eye(in_mat.rows());
00550     itpp::mat out = in_mat;
00551     int abs_in_exp = std::abs(in_exp);
00552     register int n;
00553     for (n=1;n<abs_in_exp;n++)
00554         out *= in_mat;
00555     return (in_exp>0)?out:itpp::inv(out);
00556 }
00557 
00558 }
